b'Amefuri Kuma no Ko':
b'A song by Tomoyo Harada & Keiichi Suzuki.

"Rain falls in the mountain, dancing on the ground.
Forming a small stream of water a mischievous bear runs by the stream. Silently he looks down at the water, and wonders if there is a fish\xe2\x80\xa6"

(Source: Yamamura Animation)
